- **Samsung Galaxy A32**: 64MP main camera, decent low-light performance; battery lasts about 5000mAh, typically a full day.

- **Samsung Galaxy A52**: 64MP main camera with better stabilization and low-light performance; battery also around 4500mAh, good for a full day.

- **iPhone SE (2022)**: 12MP camera, excellent photo quality and video capabilities; battery life is around 2018mAh, usually lasts a full day with moderate use.

user_profile.name: Layla Al-Mansoori
user_profile.description: Layla is a 30-year-old from a Middle Eastern background, known for her friendly demeanor but tends to keep her thoughts and feelings quite reserved. Currently working in an office environment, she finds herself in urgent need of a smartphone that can help her manage her time better due to recent social pressures and a moderate learning curve with technology. As someone who is risk-averse, she wants to ensure she makes the right choice quickly, balancing her impatience with a careful decision-making approach.

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Video calls with friends and family
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online retailers or local electronics store
